'''"Sweet Luster"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Sweet Luster" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] under a [[Rocklifting Branch]] in the [[Vourukasha Oasis]], [[Realm of Farakhkert]], [[Sumeru]].
